name: compost-hn
description: A HackerNews PWA built using Compost

scripts.build: mkdir -p public/build/libs && cp -r node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/ public/build/libs/webcomponentsjs && cp -r node_modules/@lamplightdev/compost/src/ public/build/libs/compost && cp -r node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/ public/build/libs/babel-polyfill && workbox copyLibraries public/build/libs && rollup -c && workbox injectManifest ./workbox-config.js
scripts.build:watch: mkdir -p public/build/libs && cp -r node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/ public/build/libs/webcomponentsjs && cp -r node_modules/@lamplightdev/compost/src/ public/build/libs/compost && cp -r node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/ public/build/libs/babel-polyfill && workbox copyLibraries public/build/libs&& rollup -c --watch && workbox injectManifest ./workbox-config.js

author: Chris Haynes
